item.title: CVE-2011-2187|2024-08-06T22:53:17.511Z -- xscreensaver -- xscreensaver
item.description: xscreensaver before 5.14 crashes during activation and leaves the screen unlocked when in Blank Only Mode and when DPMS is disabled, which allows local attackers to access resources without authentication.
